title: Economies of scale means decreasing LRATC

content.question: Which of the following must be true if a firm is experiencing economies of scale?

choices.label: Long-run average total cost decreases as the firm’s output increases.
Economic profits decrease as the firm’s output increases.
Long-run average total cost remains constant as the firm’s output decreases.
Proportionate increases in inputs result in less-than-proportionate increases in output.

content.answer: Long-run average total cost decreases as the firm’s output increases.
